Project Description
Media Player Web Part using SharePoint 2007 and Silverlight.


A SharePoint v3 Web Part that can be used to host media content in a SharePoint web site. The Web Part uses Silverlight 1.0 to display the media content, and provides the typical playback controls that one would expect from a web-based video player. This CodePlex project also includes all of the packaging and deployment code needed to create an installable SharePoint Solution.

Media content may be sourced from a Document Library or any URL. The Web Part also provides a Cell Consumer Connection Point that allows the video player to be connected directly to a list of URLs or a Document Library of media files.

Additional information on starting a new project is available here: Project Startup Guide.
